Key Arguments: The legislation gives bureaucrats excessive power to censor dissenting voices.
Respected experts have been silenced for questioning the government narrative.
Mainstream media has been a source of misinformation, yet is not held accountable.
The legislation could lead to an Orwellian scenario where the government controls truth.
Notable Quotes: This sounds more like a move towards an Orwellian nightmare - where the Ministry for Truth is really the Ministry of Lies and the government is all powerful.
Freedom of Speech is vital for a healthy democracy so I say a big NO to this Bill 2023.
